title: Power Cuts : 3 hours and 20 minutes daily from 6th to 8th May
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The Public Utilities Commission of Sri Lanka said power cuts for a period of 3 hours and 20 minutes daily, will be in effect from the 6th to the 8th of May.
Power Cuts : 3 hours and 20 minutes daily from 6th to 8th May
Canadian dollar seen rebounding as high oil price feeds trade surplus
